	SUMMARY

	



ADM-201, PD1 Certified and 55 trailhead badges.
·    Around 4 year of experience in Salesforce configuration, customization and Lightning.
·    Around 2 years of experience in Android, Java, JS, Cordova and React Native framework.
·    Experience in implementing the Security Model (Object, Field & Record level) in                                        Salesforce.com.
·         Experience in Apex Classes, triggers, test classes and batch jobs.
·         Experience in custom settings based development.
·         Experience in custom labels and static resources based development.
·         Knowledge and experience of integration API.
·         Experience of Apex based sharing development.
·         Experience on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery.
·         Experience on Java, React JS, XML.
·         Salesforce site pages.
·         Experience in creating Visualforce pages and Visualforce components and JS remoting.
·         Record based sharing.
·         Experience converting to Salesforce Custom Objects, Lookup Relationships, Junction      objects, Master-detail relationships.
·         Experience in designing Page layout, Custom Formula Fields, Field Dependencies, and Validation Rules.
·         Flows, Workflows and Approval Process, Process Builder.
·         Queue, Public Group. Experience in working with reports, custom report type dashboards.
·         Experience in data migration using Data Loader and Import Wizard.
Experience in Bit Bucket, Jira, and Agile methodology.
Experience in deployment Via Change Set and Eclipse IDE.

Description:
 
Development and management of the business to business sales flow for the organization that helps to provide customer service management for electronics equipment in Salesforce. Below are my roles:
 

Responsibilities:
1.      Created the object structure and their relationships.
2.      Apex triggers, batches, classes.
3.      Created overridden visualforce pages for the standard objects (Opportunity, Account, Contact, Case) and custom objects detailed pages and to create custom visualforce page reports.
4.      Workflows were used to send the emails timely.
5.      Created sharing setting, profiles, roles and permission set.
6.      Created reports using custom report types as per their business requirement. The report includes custom report types, formula fields, and bucket fields based on the amount filter. The reports that were created are summary, and matrix.
7.      Created visualforce pages for my dashboard and added it to the home component.
8.      Created record types and page layouts and give access to the appropriate picklist values as per the business requirement.
 



ANDROID PROJECTS :

1. Contact Creator Salesforce:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.contactcreatorsalesforce
It is an application that provide all contact of salesforce org into android mobile application and their details. There is also a functionality to insert new contacts and update existing contacts from android mobile application to salesforce org.

2. New Castle County Police Department App:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.project.newcastleappp
It is a informatics universal app in which user can see information of Police Department and can also submit some information ,Unique feature of this app is Push notification and Tweet List is. Push is coming for two things first  is for Twitter Tweet from Police Department and Second is for sending some alerts to Users.


2. Yataxi Application:
Developed app for Yataxi in Spanish and English languages
Yataxi Customer App- 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=akhil.ls.app.yataxicustomer_spanish

In this app customer can search his nearby drivers and can hail them for a taxi. Customer can view ride on map and can provide feedback.
Yataxi Driver App- 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=akhil.ls.app.yataxi_driver_spanish
In this app driver can get request from customer and can accept or reject request. Driver can view pickup location on map and can view ride too.
